home.scroll: Scroll Slowly to View My Story

sidebar.hire-description: I will recreate an existing website and customize it

about.p1: The Mandarin equivalent of “one” is pronounced as “yi-ke” which coincidentally sounds like my English name. I always strive to be a better version of myself, hence One Premium.
about.p2: Hi, I’m Igor. I enjoy creating things that are distinctively “me” and work with teams that are inclusive, supporting, and collaborative. That is what drew me to front-end development and project management in the first place.
about.p3: Leisure wise, I am a darts fanatic with a slight YouTube addiction. I enjoy the company of my family, girlfriend, and dog.
about.p4: I am organized, efficient, and work well with others. I look forward to offering you my service!

cert.description: Some of the most important and relevant certificates I've earned during and after college are listed below.

home.scroll: 往下滑動來了解我的故事
home.nav: 或點擊這裡以直接進到作品集

sidebar.hire-description: 我會以一個既有網站為參考，為您客製專屬網站

about.p1: One 的中文為「一個」，快速的念聽起來十分像我的英文名字Igor。我總是希望能追求卓越，展現價值，因此我將個人網站命名為One Premium。
about.p2: 嗨，我是Igor。我喜歡創造具有我個人風采的作品，也享受與樂於討論、創新的團隊合作。因為如此，我選擇朝前端工程與專案管理的領域發展。
about.p3: 休閒娛樂方面，我喜愛飛鏢運動，也有些微的YouTube成癮。沒事時我都與家人、女友、狗狗鬼混。
about.p4: 我是個認真、有效率、有能力的人，十分期待未來有機會與您合作！

cert.description: 以下列出我大學以來獲得最重要的幾張證書與證照。
cert.front-scrimba: Srimba 進階 React 課程 (2022)
